function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on infrastructure projects and staff members","Impact":"Delays in project activities, difficulty managing teams, challenges in onboarding new staff","Mitigation":"Implement remote work policies, use of technological tools for communication and collaboration, revise onboarding processes","Technologies":"Video chat, online meeting platforms, 3D design models (BIM)","People":"Directors, managers, site engineers, surveyors, design team, new staff, existing workforce, supply chain and clients","Owner":"Directors, managers, HR department"},{"Description":"Difficulty conducting drugs and alcohol tests for new staff","Impact":"Challenge in onboarding new staff","Mitigation":"Explore alternative methods for conducting tests, revise onboarding processes","Technologies":"Drug and alcohol testing technology, remote testing solutions","People":"HR department, new staff","Owner":"HR department"}]}
